title: Meghan King Edmonds' husband Jim files for divorce ONE DAY after their fifth anniversary
text:
Their relationship has been full of hardship, enduring cheating scandals and more.

And now Meghan King Edmonds and husband Jim Edmonds are officially calling it quits.

Former MLB pro Jim filed for divorce from the Real Housewives of Orange County alum, 35, on Friday, according to multiple sources who spoke to Us Weekly.

Split: Jim Edmonds has filed for divorce from RHOC alum Meghan King Edmonds

His filing came just one day after their five-year wedding anniversary.

Things came to a head when the couple got into an argument which brought the police to their home.

'Meghan and Jim have been fighting,' one source told the magazine.

'The latest fight began when he went to a recent hockey game and she began interrogating him about who he went with.'

The split comes after Meghan recently revealed the pair were working on their relationship through couple's therapy, as she sat down with Bravo's Daily Dish earlier this week.

Double trouble! Meghan and Jim share twin sons Hayes and Hart, who are 16-months-old

Red handed: Four months ago the former baseball pro was caught inappropriately texting another woman

Meghan and Jim were wed in October 2014. The couple share twin sons Hayes and Hart, who are 16-months-old as well as daughter Aspen, two.

Meghan and Jim's relationship has been fraught with drama. Just four months ago the former baseball pro was caught inappropriately texting another woman.

Afterwards Jim apologized for his conduct, telling Us Weekly: 'I engaged in an inappropriate conversation with this person.'

He defended himself, however, maintaining that the relationship was never physical.

'At no time was there any type of relationship or physical contact. Absolutely none. This is someone trying to profit from my name. I am aware she has done this to others in the past.'

Just texts: Though Jim was caught having inappropriate conversations, he maintained nothing physical ever happened with the other woman

This came as Meghan deals with their son Hart's health struggles.

Meghan has been candidly sharing her son's progress in his therapy after doctors diagnosed him with brain damage, known clinically as periventricular leukomalacia.

She talked about the brain damage diagnosis this past July on her blog.

Health journey: Meghan has been candidly sharing her son's progress in his therapy after doctors diagnosed him with brain damage, known clinically as periventricular leukomalacia. Above he's seen with his twin brother

Dealing with Hart's treatment has kept Meghan away from home as she's been seeking treatment for the toddler in New Orleans. Additionally Meghan has been taking some time back in LA.

It seems King Edmonds could already be living the life of an independent woman.

Earlier this month the reality star gave followers a tour of her sprawling St. Louis mansion, which is currently in the midst of being remodeled.

Though the couple have been working on the home together for some time, her new digs may suggest that the couple split some time ago and she's been prepping her own space.

Other signs seemed to signal the relationship was still very much on, however, as she pointed out Jim's office and walk-in closet in the video.

Still, it's possible Meghan is forging her own path.

The star recently returned to the Bravo universe with an appearance on Real Housewives Of Orange County earlier this month.
